references.paper_title: Keep it SMPL: Automatic Estimation of 3D Human Pose and Shape from a Single Image
references.reason: This paper introduces the SMPL body model, a crucial element in many human mesh recovery methods, including the one presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: End-to-end recovery of human shape and pose
references.reason: This paper is highly influential as one of the first to propose an end-to-end deep learning approach for human mesh recovery.

references.paper_title: Exemplar fine-tuning for 3D human model fitting towards in-the-wild 3D human pose estimation
references.reason: This work introduces the exemplar fine-tuning method (EFT), which this paper builds upon and improves by incorporating test-time optimization into the training process.

references.paper_title: Learning to reconstruct 3D human pose and shape via model-fitting in the loop
references.reason: This paper combines regression-based and optimization-based methods, which is conceptually related to the dual-network approach presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Model-agnostic meta-learning for fast adaptation of deep networks
references.reason: This method introduces model-agnostic meta-learning (MAML), a meta-learning algorithm that inspires the meta-learning approach used in this paper to incorporate test-time optimization into the training process.
